typeDefs: type Product { id: Int sku: String name: String price: Float status: Int visibility: Int type_id: String } type Category { id: Int name: String parent_id: Int is_active: Boolean position: Int product_count: Int } type InventoryItem { item_id: Int product_id: Int stock_id: Int qty: Float is_in_stock: Boolean is_qty_decimal: Boolean } type ProductsResponse { items: [Product] total_count: Int search_criteria: JSON } type CategoriesResponse { items: [Category] total_count: Int search_criteria: JSON } type InventoryResponse { items: [InventoryItem] total_count: Int search_criteria: JSON } extend type Query { products_list: ProductsResponse products_search: ProductsResponse product_by_sku: ProductsResponse categories_tree: CategoriesResponse categories_list: CategoriesResponse category_by_id: CategoriesResponse inventory_list: InventoryResponse inventory_by_sku: InventoryResponse inventory_search: InventoryResponse }
